news.title: Welcome to Karsog.com
news.description: Our new website is live! We are now bringing you the latest updates from the valley directly to your screen.

news.title: Winter Trekking Season Begins
news.description: The paths to Shikari Devi are now open for winter trekking enthusiasts. Please carry adequate warm clothing.

news.title: Local Business Directory Launched
news.description: Find the best hotels, homestays, and shops in Karsog using our new trusted directory feature.
